name: admin
description: Full system access with all administrative privileges including user management, system configuration, academic settings, and complete data access across all modules

name: principal
description: School leadership role with access to academic oversight, staff management, student discipline, and institutional reporting and analytics

name: accounting
description: Financial management role with access to fee management, payment processing, financial reporting, expense tracking, and student billing operations

name: teacher
description: Educator role with access to class management, student grading, attendance tracking, assessment creation, and parent communication for assigned classes

name: student
description: Student role with access to personal academic records, assignments, grades, attendance, class schedules, and school announcements

name: parent
description: Parent role with access to their children's academic progress, attendance records, grades, teacher communications, and school announcements

name: counselor
description: Guidance role with access to student behavioral records, academic intervention, parent consultations, and student support services

name: nurse
description: Health services role with access to student medical records, health alerts, medication management, and emergency contact information

name: secretary
description: Administrative support role with access to student enrollment, parent communications, document management, and general office operations

name: librarian
description: Library management role with access to student library records, book tracking, educational resources, and reading program coordination

name: driver
description: Transportation role with access to student transportation lists, route management, student pick-up/drop-off tracking, and safety incident reporting

name: assistant
description: General helper staff role with flexible access to assist with various school operations, administrative tasks, classroom support, and other duties as assigned by school administration
